survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Onboarding Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees on their experience with the company's digital onboarding process, identifying strengths and areas for improvement to enhance new hire integration.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall digital onboarding experience at our company?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall digital onboarding experience at our company?

questions.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.

script.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources did you find most helpful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the biggest challenge you faced during the digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Keep the text box large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What was the biggest challenge you faced during the digital onboarding process?

questions.question_text: How long did it take for you to feel fully acclimated to your role after the digital onboarding process?
answer_options: I still do not feel fully acclimated

script.question_text: How long did it take for you to feel fully acclimated to your role after the digital onboarding process?
answer_options: I still do not feel fully acclimated

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our digital onboarding process?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture actionable feedback. Ensure mobile responsiveness for longer responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our digital onboarding process?
